title: Mr Beast passed me in s ubs..

comments.comment: Damn in all my life I wouldn't have expected Pewdiepie to be talking to us about Buddhist teachings man. As a Buddhist this is amazing, I'm sharing this to everyone I know for sure.
I love how felix became this matured that he will just focus and do the things he wants to do and needed to do because that's life.

This is a man who became so good at what he does, that he got bored of doing it and decided that caring about it further would lead to an eternal struggle for some outlandish validation that simply doesn't exist for him anymore. Kudos on Nirvana, Felix!

Love how he's promoting these healthy habits to his fanbase from 
 genuine care and interest and not under the guise of wanting financial gain- happy to be able to grow as a long time watcher starting from middle school, and have the content grow as well alongside me as I am in University.

I appreciate the way you've evolved over the years. For the, now former, number one youtuber to accept passing of the torch by posting a 12 minute video introducing philosophy makes me proud of this generation of creators.

Haven't watched Pewdiepie's videos for quite some time now. That is when I came across this video. I genuinely liked this kind of video that is wholesome and useful for me. Its like watching a useful self-improvement video but with Pewds cherry on top. Appreciate it.
Thank you for being the person you are. Knowing the fact that you are among the top content creators on Youtube returned my faith in humanity.

It's amazing to have a huge influencer to share their new found wisdom.. Straight up positivity and words of encouragement for younger generations to learn than just the toxic media they're usually fed. Love you pewds! You're 'character arc' is freaking beautiful, my guy. <3
I love how he’s using his big platform to spread positive and like good information it’s nice

I really appreciate how felix’s content has evolved over the years; as his fanbase grew up, so did his content. I remember watching this guys gaming videos in middle school, and now, here I am watching his book reviews in uni, crazy how time flies.
Honestly I think I've grown with pewds. In 2016 I enjoyed the edgy frank style humor,  and in almost 2023 I read books and enjoy a philosophical perspective. Truly amazing.
I love this format bc it always teaches me something about life which makes me feel good and calms me down. And it's funny too bc it's Felix telling us the content :D

i fucking love felix’s book reviews, probably my fav series of his. it’s so calming and fun to watch felix ramble on about his interpretations and ideas he gathers from the books he reads. not to mention i get some good recommendations! <3 much love pewds, been here for 9 years!!
when the world needed book review the most... it returned

Hi old pal. I'm in my 20s now and started watching you when I was 12 (when you made your facade videos). I haven't watched much the past couple years, but I'll never forget all of the great times I had watching you growing up. How many rough times you got me through. You were a good male role model for a kid with few of them. Thank you. Wishing you luck.

You're still the best entertainer ever. I don't watch your content much these days, but I watched you a lot when I was younger. You made me laugh and you made me happy. You were a friend, while I didn't have any.
Don’t forget what Felix achieved. For nearly all of his 111 million subs, he has single-handedly entertained us. That’s a huge achievement.
Hands down it might be one of the most favorite videos beside discussing adult grown up thoughts and materials. It shows humbleness, accepting philosophy admiring it. KING OF YOUTUBE

I love how felix went from being a kid who screamed at amnesia custom maps to an incredibly well read, articulate, and intelligent person and that it's all recorded. It's hard to not be optimistic seeing someone grow like that
Happy for both Felix and Jimmy for all of their success. They made so many days better for people all over the world and that's worth more than money and subscribers. Thank you.

Thank you Felix! It's amazing to see how much you've grown, while also kinda growing parallel to you
I think many people would enjoy longer philosophy videos because it's very refreshing to see someone who is actually trying to truly appreciate philosophy!
‘’If you have a fear of loosing what you have then you’re ultimately being controlled by it’’ hits different
I always come back to this video when im feeling  a little bit annoyed, this video is just like therapy to my mind.   This video make me feel better

I think it speaks volumes about what kind of guy pewdiepie is , seeing that his response to MR Beast overtaking him in subs was a book review. Shows his humbleness, class and maturity. It’s so refreshing to have the biggest YouTuber of all time stick to want he wants to do and not chase numbers ! Also enjoyed the book reviews so much
I'm glad that you're still making this kind of videos, they're very chill and informative. Thank you!

i remember watching Felix when i was 8 years old with my brother and no matter how many subs he’s had, i’ve always found my way back here for almost 13 years. You will always be the king of Youtube, it take’s a lot to keep people coming back for years on end.

This is such a good watch. 
Can't wait for more reviews!

I love this man so much.

Had such a massive influence on me: shaping my sense of humour, perspective on life and personal philosophy. He's even inspired me to start working out. 

Love you and Thank you, Felix 

Frfr

1. (0:28) In The Buddha’s Words 
2. (3:21) The Nicomechean Ethics 
3. (5:37) Enchoridion 
4. (8:01) The Gay Science 
5. () The mathematical Universe 
6. () This book loves you
I was not expecting a discussion of such deep meaning. Pewds never ceased to amaze.
Great philosophy / book review video once again...love these. Very nice. :)

Ah man, I love this
Pewds has grown over the years and the beauty about it, is that we love all of the content ️

Pewdiepie you still remain the best. This is so refreshing and realistic. Thank you for posting this! Getting those first 1,000 subscribers and 4,000 watch hours seems so far away for me right now, but with each video, I am getting a little closer to that goal. It will take a lot of time, patience, and consistency, but I can't wait to have that feeling of getting to where you guys are someday. So cool!
You have given us billions of laughs. Thank you for everything pewds.
After like 5 years or more being the number 1 youtuber, a replacement has finally arrived, but we will never forget the one who controlled the YouTube kingdom for years, a great Felix
This video was genuinely helpful, I’ve been dealing with some bad anxiety lately and this really put some things into perspective for me. Thank you!!

It's so nice to see that even extremely popular people can stay completely out of any toxicity and encourage & influence other people positively. I wish you all the best in everything what you are doing. Keep it up and regards from Tokyo to Tokyo ;-)!
its genuinely entertaining and captivating to hear you talk about these things. thanks dude.
Thanks for all your videos, Pewdiedie. Congratulations mrbeast
Crazy to see how much of a fan Mrbeast was, to absolutely surpassing his sub goal, reaching his dream goal, and being noticed by literally every yt creator… WHAT AN inspiration

I could listen to him talk all day about philosophy and such.
You're a gem, lad.
listening to felix being so passionate about philosophy is so enjoyable, every time I realise it's a book review I get so excited.. wish pewds would do them more then once a year lol
Honestly the humblest man I’ve never met
Super happy of what Pewdiepie has been, congrats for everything Felix, you've done phenomenaly along with your friends and coworkers
after all these years.. You are still my fave one of all! love You felix!
Really speaks volumes when it’s just mostly been one guy, compared to a cast, or a literal company. Truly remarkable how far he’s come

piewdie pie is the example of a real youtube
havn't increased in subs for years
still uploads
still tries his best to cheer and make his true audince happy
respect for you piewdiepie

I wasn't lucky enough to know pewds for a long time but im happy that i came across his channel he made laugh countless times, made me wanna get in shape and think about my life decisions wanting to be better so thank you pewds for being there
Honestly what a crazy achievement for mr beast I never would of thought I’d see another YouTuber surpass Pewds in my lifetime
Mr beast passing pewds in subs and then him putting out a book review on famous philosophers completely sums up the character growth he has gone through in the last few years
I don't watch PewDiePie that much anymore because I enjoy gaming content the most but I still support him. He was a large part of my life growing up. A living legend among YouTube creators
The way you grew in everything, being there our entire childhood is something I will always keep with me.
It feels so good to be able to mature with felix. It seems like his content is catered towards me as the years go by and I age.

5:50
“There are things in life that you can’t control, and there are things in life that you can’t control. Don’t worry about things you can’t control”
What a great and motivating quote Pewdiepie really knows :’)
we need more content like this more often felix pleaseeee book review or philosophy in general, i love it personally

Really happy you're doing more of this, it's really interesting to hear about philosophy, even at a basic understanding, because it takes a lot of the things I feel and ways i think and puts it into words so I can help understand myself and why I and othsrs think the way we do,

I wrote one of my college essays based off one of your recommendations because I read it after you released your book review. You influenced my way of thinking in a way I’m thankful for, that’s why I feel like your book reviews are cool
i may not watch your content as much these days, but you are still my favourite youtuber.
I woke up into an existential crisis today and this video single-handedly brought me back into my body and I would like to thank you for that Felix, you did more than you thought with this one
Crazy to think about how far this channel has come and how much both pewds and his community have grown
I really do love when Felix educates us about philosophy, stuff is so important and should be studied by everyone :')

PewDiePie will forever be the #1 YouTuber to an entire generation ... The first "YouTube kids" literally grew up with him. He doesn't know me, never will, but I genuinely consider him a friend! 

And congrats to Jimmy. He deserves everything he's got, and I honestly can't think of anyone more worthy of carrying the torch!

Felix is the Philosophy teacher we need, he somehow translates the books he read so everyone can understand. God bless you, Felix, you might not be number one on youtube anymore, but who cares about numbers, deep inside we all know you are still the number one YouTuber, even after being retired.

2:40 "To me, this is really about self-control. Take control of your body... this really helped with my own problems in the past."
Really glad Felix finally got over his incontinence issues. I'm so proud of him!
I really appriciate the editing in these videos, it really makes the content easier to understand
I wish Felix realized that most of his fans LOVE these videos and I hope he makes longer ones in this format
I would love a PewDiePie Podcast where he just talks about this kind of stuff and other thing he has learned etc. that would be awesome
Still the goat. Love the content to this day. I ve been watching you since 2013, feel like I ve grown up with you, keep up the uploads and pls bring back book review for realsies

You’re still on top pewds lol you always will be. Like other people said, Mr. Beast does huge crazy productions that appeal to the algorithm whereas you have been by yourself and with Marzia and Sive (I haven’t been watching all your videos so idk Sive but I’ve been here since the beginning) doing whatever you want to do really and you’ve been the king of YouTube forever. That’s amazing man. You’ll always be at the top in my book. ️
If Mr. Beast overtaking him in subscribers is what's going to have PewDiePie bring book review back, then I'm all for it.

While jimmy makes crazy and phenomenal content and his has a whole team and crew working around the clock to produce such great content. And it definitely deserves to be awarded. With that being said Felix, you have never been a “production”. It’s always been you and Sive. To amass the amount of followers you have from truly just you. Is a mind blowing accomplishment and just know we will never forget that. We love you Pewds
Felix tricked me into watching a video about philosophy books and I thoroughly enjoyed every second of it… this man has unstoppable power
would love for you to make another literature video pewds. loved these videos back in the day.

I’ve loved this new era of Felix!!! It’s seriously just posting whatever he wants, and also I think we get to see his personality more. He’s in his Jenna Marbles’s “Im a 32 year old lady” phase where she did whatever she wanted… I MISS HER SO MUCH

All the phases Pewds went through:
-the edgy phase
-the alcoholic phase
-the gym bro phase
-the philosopher phase
Yo pewds you’ve grown so much. Much love  thanks for the awesome moments you’ve given us
Pewdiepie isn't just a phase, it's a lifestyle. A gamer, a news presenter, a gym bro, a philosopher, basically an older brother we've never met but became a significant part of our lives.

Mr.Beast is an independent conglomerate with Jimmy as the face at this point.  It's still mostly just Felix and Sive doing it all, and for that you are still the number 1 most subscribed creator.  Keep on crushin' it man!
I remember when mrbeast was helping you past T-series and now he's passed you. Fair play Mrbeast
thank you so much for doing videos like this, Felix. the loneliness dissipates for 12 minutes because you talk and feel like a friend. also: thanks for further developing my interest in philosophy
Dude this is freaking great, having deep opinion from a great youtuber you like is awesome.

I can’t say enough about how much I loved this video. The books, the edits, the MrBeast shoutout and you just make us laugh. My favorite book is the last one you mentioned! 
PewDiePie
This literally helps me get enlightened on things i tend to be stuck on. You're amazing felix!
Thank you for you inspiring video Felix. I love your book reviews and philosophy videos, especially when you talk about Buddhist concepts. Also please do more Japan vlogs!! ️
Although, Mr. Beast has officially passed Pewdiepie in subs, he still is number 1 to me, with him making it to where he was on his own for the most part
Hope they both always be on good terms
This is a perfect example of "The student surpassing the master"
Pewds saw that Mr beast passed him and didn’t make a music video or video about it at all. He just blew our minds and goes on to tmmr. Ur the king Felix
That video was awesome. You're still the number one "person" on YouTube even if your channel isn't anymore. Long live the king.
This is just my favorite type of videos. So wholesome to see a fellow book lover trying to explain complicated premises with silly anecdotes to get his fellow humans interested in philosophy xD
I can’t believe I started watching pewdiepie at 14 and now I’ll be 26  glad to be part of this journey
I respect you for discussing self improvement and philosophy to your audience

I remember not wanting to watch the popular YouTubers cause I thought they would be stupid and foolish, BUT I have been pleasantly surprised by Pewdiepie in the years that I have been watching him. He is smart, wise, funny, and surprisingly humble. It was then that I realized why he was so loved. He deserves it. Great guy.
I'm so proud to have followed your growth over the years
i love that we all grew toigether, even pewds. i love this guy and jacksepticeye for life man. really gave a friend to the community
Pewdiepie has achieved that status where, eventhough MrBeast surpassed him it still feels like PewDiePie is the king of Youtube and Felix doesn't need to prove himself anymore. GOAT status
It's odd how I miss Felix after not seeing his videos for a week or more, I really found a big part of myself with this guy.
You're still #1 to millions. I may not watch your content much these days, but you were a positive force in my teen years. Thank you for doing what you love for the sake of entertaining. Brofist
This is literally what I want right now .... Popular youtubers reviewing books , spreading knowledge , Giving life lessons and all. The Internet has cheered me up today
It’s crazy I remeber  pewdiepie being such a big part of my childhood with his horror gameplays they were so funny  he’s never stopped being one of the greatest
You are always the top mrbeast never passed you also I feel bad for pewdiepie because he was friend with mrbeast for a long time.
I like the break down of each book , I like the examples you use. Clear and concise
Pewds should be a therapist more often.  I love this.  Been here since the very beginning,  and these vids still hit me in the throat.
No Matter How Many People Pass You In subs you will always be #1 in our hearts
I remember watching Mr Beast back when he had like 800,000 subs and now he made it to the top. Its crazy but I think its awesome and well deserved.
we love you felix you'll always be #1 in our hearts
These pewdiepie philosophy vids are so goated, literally the reason I ended up doing philosophy in college.
mr beast make people happy help people in need and he stays with his content i stop watching the videos when you stop gaming
love his book reviews because he inserts humor that i can actually relate to. can't wait for the next one felix
I don't watch because of how many subscribers you have, I watch because you are still the most entertaining YouTuber in my mind and the most real, please don't stop making videos any time soon
I feel like he has been waiting for this day and I think he’s finally glad it’s here you will always be king any way
